title: President Rajapaksa graces the Ranaviru Real Star-Mission 2 grand finale
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: President Media Unit) Ayomi Perera of the Sri Lanka Army won the Grand Finale of the ‘Ranaviru Real Star’ -Mission 2, which was held at the Sugathadasa Indoor Stadium in Colombo, a short while ago….
